Articles.Content:
Challenge:

Get a very high TWR rocket and make it do something. A TWR > 6 is good enough for me.

Normal Mode: Launch a high TWR rocket to orbit.

Hard Mode: Launch a high TWR rocket to the Mun.

Super-Hard Mode: Impress me.

Crashed my install four times just to accomplish this mission. Weighing in at nearly 3 kilotons, and sporting a couple hundred vectors, I present FOOM2.

To the Mun in a rather straight line. Back from the Mun in a less impressive manner because I landed near a pole.
You might be interested in the Fastest time to space and return Challenge. The ships within pull 15+ gs all the way to space! I wonder where else they could go...
